column1: This dataset on 'credit_risk_score.xlsx' is hypothetical and was generated
by Paolo G. Hilado (Github: Dcroix) for training purposes . Considering
that most of the values generated by this dataset were designed to be consistent with
its given scenario, in such a rare case that it resembles any existing dataset, it is purely
Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 International Public License.
